headline: PNC to Acquire FirstBank in $4.1B Deal, Expand in Colorado & Arizona

headline: Invesco (IVZ): Revisiting Valuation as Shares Gain 45% Over the Past Year
summary: Invesco (IVZ) might not be in today’s headlines for a dramatic news event. However, the steady climb in its stock over the past few months is starting to turn heads among investors weighing their next move. With financials often under the microscope during periods of market uncertainty, it makes sense to pause and consider what is really driving IVZ’s performance lately and whether the stock’s current price reflects its genuine prospects. Looking at the bigger picture, Invesco shares have...

headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces August 31, 2025 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1 today reported preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $2,063.6 billion, an increase of 1.9% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $11.1 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net inflows were $1.9 billion and money market net outflows were $7.4 billion. AUM was positively impacted by favorable market returns which increased AUM by $27 billion. FX increased AUM by $6.1 billion. Preliminary average total AUM for t
